name: Jiangsu Zeversolar New Energy Co., Ltd
description: “Jiangsu Zeversolar New Energy Co., Ltd.” is merged by “Jiangsu Eversolar New Energy Co., Ltd.” and “Jiangsu ZOF New Energy Ltd.” Zeversolar combines Eversolar’s low and medium power inverters and ZOF’s high power inverters, in other words, Zeversolar possesses all series of on-grid photovoltaic inverters from 1.5kW to 1MW. All the inverters can meet the requirement of different systems, including household roof system, commercial roof system, large-scale ground PV power plant system, and etc. Meanwhile, Zeversolar has monitoring products, such as PMU, Solareye, in order to satisfy special monitoring requirements. After merged, Zeversolar has 400 employees, and by the end of 2011, the production capacity has been enlarged to 2GW.
